data.name: Catty and Batty: The Spirit Guide Demo
data.detailed_description:
Catty & Batty 2: The Spirit Guide is a casual couch co-op puzzle game, inspired by Lemmings and Tower Defense! Play as Catty or Batty and build a path to guide spirits home.

In the demo you can play the first 10 levels of the full game!

Here is what you can expect in the complete release:

  • 🗺️ Campaign with 30 levels for 1-2 players (local co-op)
  • 🖋️ Over 750 hand-drawn sprites
  • 🎞️ Over 200 animations
  • 🕬 Over 85 new sounds
  • 🎼 Original soundtrack
  • 🎮 100% Controller support
  • 🌈 6 color modes (white, sepia, gray, dark, inverted, gameboy)

Thank you for giving it a try!

data.short_description: Cooperatively build a path to guide spirits home!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 or higher
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: (<

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
